MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA7 postcode area of Halton Lodge, affecting properties in Fenwick Lane, Budworth Close, Cranage Close and surrounding streets.  This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:04PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:27PM on 13th January 2021.
